messages.subject: Re: Welcome Melissa
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Melissa! Just to let you know, I too was a curriculum user. However, after seeking treatment (via many hours of research) I discovered how to relax with my
messages.messageBody:
Hi Melissa!
Just to let you know, I too was a curriculum user. However, after
seeking treatment (via many hours of research) I discovered how to relax
with my kids and trust their curiousity.
We find a lot of good material at the library (even though it's a
lil'behind the rest of the world). Ds loves fantasy games, science, and
even math (for the moment). Dd hates math, but loves animal based
science, experiments, cooking, and is stuck on Explorers. Well, enough
rambling, Welcome!! Aleasa in MS
